description: PatCit unique id. Consolidated unique id (e.g. DOI, Accession Number, etc) if any, md5 hash otherwise.
name: patcit_id

description: PATSTAT Non-Patent Literature publication identification (2018b). Surrogate key for Non-Patent Literature publications.
name: npl_publn_id

description: Standards body (aka standards organization, standards developing organization (SDO)).
name: body

description: Technical Specification Group. This is a specialized subgroup within a body working on a specific technology.
name: tsg

description: Type of the document (TS, TR, RFC, ...).
name: type

description: Identification number of the technical document.
name: tdoc_num

description: Number citations of the document identified by patcit_id originated by patents.
name: is_cited_by_count

description: Classification score of npl_cat (0,1]. By convention, 1 means that the category assigned is based on a rule and not on the classification model used otherwise.
name: npl_cat_score

description: Flag NPL citations with a detected language different from the classification model's training scope.
name: npl_cat_language_flag

description: ISO-2 language code detected using pycld2 or pycld3 (https://github.com/aboSamoor/pycld2 or https://github.com/bsolomon1124/pycld3).
name: language_code

fields.description: PATSTAT application identification. Surrogate key: Technical unique identifier without any business meaning.
fields.name: appln_id

fields.description: PATSTAT origin of the citation. Provenance of the citation.
fields.name: origin

fields.description: Identifier of a DOCDB simple family. Means that most probably the applications share exactly the same priorities (Paris Convention or technical relation or others).
fields.name: docdb_family_id

fields.description: Identifier of an INPADOC extended priority family. Means that the applications share a priority directly or indirectly via a third application.
fields.name: inpadoc_family_id
